code:
// read url params message, then place message into state so it can be displayed on screen
function getURLparam(param){var url=window.location.href;var urlParam=param;urlParam=urlParam.replace(/[\[\]]/g,'\\$&');var regex=new RegExp('[?&]'+urlParam+'(=([^&#]*)|&|#|$)'),results=regex.exec(url);if(!results||!results[2]){return null;}else{var m=decodeURIComponent(results[2].replace(/\+/g,' '));m=m.replace(/-/g,' ').replace(/\b\w/g,function(l){return l.toUpperCase();});return m;}}export{getURLparam};
